item.description: This paper was presented in the 65th North American Meetings of the Regional Science Association International Conference held on 7-10 November 2018 at San Antonio, TX. This paper is scheduled to be presented at the 56th Annual Meetings of the Public Choice Society, March 14-16, 2019 at the Hyatt Regency Downtown Louisville, Kentucky.
